jobs.title: Founding AE
jobs.descriptionHtml:
🏥 What We Do

At Vitalize, we are building the OS for hospital operations, starting with staffing & scheduling optimization.

Labor is 60% of the P&L of American healthcare. However, hospital’s core processes to manage and optimize labor live on paper, spreadsheets, or through departments of 20+ FTEs. Vitalizes transforms these processes from painstakingly tedious to autonomous, freeing up thousands of hours and reducing labor costs by 8-figures.

🪓 About the role

Within 6 months of starting, Vitalize reached 7-figures in ARR and is on track to be the fastest growing company in enterprise healthcare. We’re hiring for a Founding AE to help us build the best enterprise GTM motion in healthcare and scale Vitalize past $10M in ARR this year. You’ll be selling our software to health systems and work directly with our CEO to build Vitalize Care’s GTM organization.

🥇 Skills

  • 2+ years of enterprise sales experience.

  • Proven track record of closing high 6 figure and 7 figure enterprise contracts.

  • Ability to “make something out of nothing.” We’re excited about individuals who identify creative avenues to identify leads and scale our pipeline.

  • Nice to Have Experiences: experience working with health systems, experience at seed or Series A stage startups

📍 Location

  • In-Person, San Francisco, CA 🌉

  • Travel to conferences and potential customer sites up to 50% of days

🙌 Benefits

  • Medical, dental, and vision insurance

  • 401k and 401k match

  • Unlimited PTO

  • Bi-annual company retreats

  • Reimbursement for gym subscription (~$100 per month)

  • Reimbursement for BayWheels membership/new bike and Ubers

  • In-office meals

jobs.title: Full-Stack Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
🏥 What We Do

At Vitalize, we are building the OS for hospital operations, starting with staffing & scheduling optimization.

Currently, hospitals’ core processes to manage and optimize labor live on paper, spreadsheets, or through departments of 20+ FTEs. Vitalizes’s technology transforms these processes from painstakingly tedious to autonomous, freeing up thousands of hours and reducing labor costs by 8-figures.

In less than 6 months, Vitalize has reached 7-figures in ARR and is backed by top investors, including Y Combinator and top health systems.

We are a small team of Stanford, Cambridge, and Columbia dropouts, former math champs, and repeat founders.

🪓 About the role

We're hiring for a full-stack engineer to work closely with co-founders and early customers to ship product and iterate fast.

In this role, you have the opportunity to take end-to-end ownership over features that with every customer launch will touch thousands of users across the enterprise, and ultimately help health systems operate more efficiently and deliver better patient care.

🧭 Responsibilities

  • Work directly with co-founders to ship features and meet ambitious customer goals

  • Talk to customers and end-users to iterate on product features based on feedback

  • Shape the engineering culture and the product roadmap

🧐 Interesting Problems

  • Vitalize Intelligence: A real-time, event-driven engine that integrates and reconciles messy, high-latency data across EHRs, HRIS, timekeeping, and payroll systems - creating a dynamic digital twin of hospital operations.

  • Predictive Modeling: Forecasting future patient volume and staffing needs using AI/ML models trained on historical census trends, patient throughput, and real-time movement across departments (e.g., ED → ICU).

  • Optimization & Recommendations Engine: A real-time decision layer that recommends optimal staffing actions based on dozens of dynamic factors: cost, acuity, patient safety, skill mix, sick calls, fairness, and more.

  • Autonomous Scheduling: A first-of-its-kind prompt-based scheduling system that automates manual workflows for charge nurses and staffing coordinators. This is “Copilot for Nurse Scheduling.”

🥇 Skills

  • Nice-to-have: TypeScript, React, Postgres

  • Our stack: Vite, tRPC, Effect, Drizzle, Supabase

🙌 Benefits

  • Medical, dental, and vision insurance

  • 401k and 401k match

  • Unlimited PTO

  • Bi-annual company retreats

  • Free Lunch and Dinner in-office

  • Relocation Bonus ($5000)

  • Reimbursement for desk setup, gym subscription, and commute

jobs.title: Operations
jobs.descriptionHtml:
🏥 What We Do

At Vitalize, we are building the OS for hospital operations, starting with staffing & scheduling optimization.

Currently, hospitals’ core processes to manage and optimize labor live on paper, spreadsheets, or through departments of 20+ FTEs. Vitalizes’s technology transforms these processes from painstakingly tedious to autonomous, freeing up thousands of hours and reducing labor costs by 8-figures.

In less than 6 months, Vitalize has reached 7-figures in ARR and is backed by top investors, including Y Combinator and top health systems.

✍️ About the Role

We’re scaling fast, and growth is outpacing hiring. The ideal person for this role can step in and tackle the company’s biggest operational challenges to keep up. This is effectively getting your hands on everything that falls in between sales and engineering.

You'll own the E2E implementation of Vitalize's software across enterprise health systems of thousands of users, and build the playbook along the way. As you become an expert on our customers through support and onboarding, you’ll have the opportunity to directly shape the roadmap by working with our eng and design teams. You are talking to customers every single day.

🧭 Why you should join us?

  • Rapid Growth: We have signed on 20+ hospitals in less than 12 months of ideation, and have no signs of slowing down. We keep the team lean, and move fast. Nothing trumps execution.

  • Rockstar Team: We are a small team of published healthcare researchers, college and grad school dropouts, former McKinsey consultants, former US math champions, and previous VC-backed founders. We only hire the best.

  • Customer Obsessed: Every team member visits customer sites. We talk to users every hour. We know their workflows, and their drink of choice. Empathy fuels everything we build.

  • Professional Growth: As an early employee, you will have the opportunity to eventually build and lead a team that helps us keep up with growth and maximize success. You’ll also have a huge role in day-to-day decisions that guide the overall trajectory and growth of the company.

📍 Location + Hours**

  • In-person in SF

  • Travel to Vitalize Care customer sites (~50%)

jobs.title: Support/Success Operations
jobs.descriptionHtml:
🏥 The Role

Vitalize is at a unique inflection point. We have a strong base of enterprise customers who love our product and dozens of new hospitals preparing to go live. To sustain that growth, we need to lay the foundation for world-class support — one that scales with our customer base and eliminates single points of failure. This role will be responsible for building that infrastructure from the ground up, creating the systems, documentation, and workflows that ensure customers feel supported long after go-live.

You’ll work closely with our Operations and Engineering teams to shape the handoff from implementation to post-stabilization, ensuring a seamless experience for hospital leaders and staff. You’ll own relationships with key stakeholders, act as the voice of the customer, and surface insights that influence our product roadmap. We’re looking for someone who’s unafraid to dive deep into the weeds to solve problems firsthand — and then use those insights to design scalable structure and process. Someone who transcends silos, collaborates across every function, and develops a global understanding of how our customers operate.

✍️ What You’ll Do

  • Frontline Support: Own communications with end users through multi-modal support channels (SMS, in-app messaging, and email), resolving issues end-to-end by becoming an expert in the product.

  • Internal Enablement: Partner with Product and Ops to build and maintain internal knowledge, playbooks, and documentation of global customer context — integrating these into the customer onboarding process (via Notion and Intercom).

  • Stakeholder Relationships: Navigate multi-level stakeholder relationships, especially during escalations or near upsells, to keep customers in the green. Host recurring PM syncs, office hours, and user check-ins post-stabilization.

  • Shape the Product Roadmap: Document trends, synthesize insights, and collaborate directly with founders, Engineering, and Operations to influence product direction and prioritization.

  • Build Scalable Processes: Identify and implement ways to make our support org scale non-linearly — leveraging automation and AI to enhance response speed and judgment.

  • Customer Visits: Travel to customer sites (~25%) to deepen relationships and understand real-world workflows firsthand.

🥇What You’ll Bring

  • Minimum 2–6 years of experience in Customer Success, Support, or Operations, ideally at an early-stage SaaS or tech-enabled services startup.

  • Tech-savvy: comfortable navigating tools like Intercom, Linear, Slack, Jam, and Notion — and experimenting with AI or automation tools to streamline work.

  • Bias for action: you’re willing to jump into any issue, large or small, and see it through to resolution.

  • Empathy and communication: you can explain complex issues simply and manage multiple stakeholder levels with professionalism and warmth.

  • Builder mindset: you think critically about process, scaling, and how to design support systems that grow faster than ticket volume.

  • Executive presence: comfortable representing Vitalize to director-level stakeholders and guiding them through problem-solving and post-launch success.

🧭 Why Join Us

  • Professional Growth: As an early member of the support function, you’ll help define what world-class support looks like in healthcare — and eventually build and lead a team to keep up with our growth. You’ll work directly with the founders and play a central role in day-to-day decisions that shape the company’s trajectory.

  • Rapid Growth: We’ve signed 20+ hospitals within a year of ideation and are accelerating fast. We keep the team lean, move with urgency, and value execution above all else.

  • Rockstar Team: We’re a tight-knit group of published healthcare researchers, college and grad school dropouts, former McKinsey consultants, national math champions, and previous VC-backed founders. We only hire exceptional talent.

  • Customer Obsessed: Every team member visits customer sites. We talk to users daily — we know their workflows, pain points, and even their coffee orders. Empathy drives everything we build.

  • Compensation: Competitive early-stage package with meaningful equity upside

🙌 Benefits

  • Medical, dental, and vision insurance

  • 401k and 401k match

  • Flexible PTO

  • Bi-annual company retreats

  • Free Lunch and Dinner in-office

  • Relocation Bonus

  • Reimbursement for desk setup, gym subscription, and commute

Interested?
Send us a short note on why you’d be excited to build and scale customer success at Vialtize — and tell us about a time you improved a process or support experience that scaled beyond your own work.
